title: 09/22/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 09/22/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, ESPN's Dan Orlovsky calls in to discuss the Chiefs. Is there a style of play that would be most effective in beating them? Broadcasting legend Brent Musburger joins the show to discuss how he covered NFL gambling before it was mainstream. And can the Sixers win a title with Ben Simmons? DP and the guys discuss...
